public class Actions extends Object

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    attack()
    you attack the enemy, decreases charge by 1 you can only attack if your charge is greater than 0 if enemy attacks or defends, no damage is taken
    void
    charge()
    you charge, increasing charge by 1 each charge allows you to attack once
    void
    choose()
    you and opponent choose action
    void
    defend()
    you defend, nullifying opponent's attack
    int
    getOpponentHealth()
    returns opponent character's HP
    int
    getRound()
    returns the number of rounds since start of the game
    int
    getYourHealth()
    returns your character's HP
    String
    getYourName()
    returns your character's name
    void
    resetRound()
    resets round to 1, signaling the restart of the game

      public void attack()
      you attack the enemy, decreases charge by 1 you can only attack if your charge is greater than 0 if enemy attacks or defends, no damage is taken
